text:
My client's had an issue where somehow a contact was able to access another (unrelated) contact's data when logged in. I can see that same contact's data when the "contact_vid" is set to "null" so I suspect that what happened is:

1. The user logged in, and somehow reached the membership page with a null contact_vid (I don't know why a contact_vid wasn't assigned in the first place)
2. There are contacts in the portal without a contact_vid (presumably imported), and the first record with a null contact_vid was exposed
This is not great, HubSpot Support sent the client back my way since I developed the membership site and I've added in a condition to check for the contact_vid as a failsafe, but I really don't think a null value should expose any contact data in the first place. Who might I reach out to about this?
Hey Stephenie, do you happen to have the ticket ID for your customer's ticket? I'm of the same opinion that this doesn't seem right and I'd like to get this moved along to the correct people
I don't, but I can send you their portal ID if that helps?
Or I could ask them for it
I _should_ be able to get it from the portal ID!
Could you please DM that to me :slightly_smiling_face:
Thank you for jumping on this so quickly!
